text: Moshi anata ga kare-ra ni,`tenchi o tsukutta no wa dare ka.' To toeba, kare-ra wa kanarazu `arrā.' To iudearou. Itte yaru ga ī. `Sorenara anata gata wa kangaenai no ka. Arrā no soto ni anata gata no inoru mono-tachi wa, moshi arrā ga watashi ni taishi saiyaku o o nozomi no toki, kare no saiyaku o nozoku koto ga dekiru no ka. Mata watashi ni taishi jihi o o nozomi no toki, kare no jihi o kyohi suru koto ga dekiru ka.' Itte yaru ga ī. `Watashi wa, arrā ga ireba banzendearu.
